request: Build BallCode game with organized level structure and standardized UI/UX. Ensure all levels follow consistent naming, structure, and UI patterns. Prepare for proper build and deployment.

unityEdits.changes: Ensure all level JSON files follow standard naming convention: book{M}_mode{MODE}_level{N}.json and use consistent structure
Ensure all UI elements follow consistent layout, colors, and interaction patterns across all game modes
Verify LevelData structure supports all required fields for organized level creation

actionPlan.notes: This build will organize the game structure for consistent level development and UI/UX standards. All future levels will follow the standardized process outlined in BALLCODE-STREAMLINED-DEVELOPMENT-PLAN.md
